mdRecord.dcterms:title: Nursing School
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nursing instruction. Notation on back, "Preclinical student nurses at the University of Virginia are shown in a class supervised by Ann Pollok, right. In the bed is Lois Ann Feiber, 47 East Lock Lane, Richmond. The other student nurses are, left to right, Doris M. Hancock, 1126 Hull Street, Richmond; Martha Rhyme, 1015 Bryant Street, N.E., Washington; Phyllis Edmonston, 325 Crittenden Street, N.W., Washington; and Ninaligi Bader, Honolulu, Hawaii."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
